content.raw: I believe that `AdjustPose()` code is the same as the code in `RobotPlugin::AdjustPose()` for the case of a ground vehicle. `TerrainLookup()` looks also the same as `RobotPlugin::AdjustPose()`. We don't have to refactor it in this pull request, but maybe we could create a `Movable` interface or something similar that provides the `TerrainLookup` functionality and a default `AdjustPose` implementation (similar to the one for ground vehicles).
